fields.value: Go to the <#558289444927700992> channel to accept our Discord rules, or you won't be able to do much else here.

fields.name: <:6075battlenet:1402492580230332598>  BATTLE.NET
fields.value: Then, push the button below link your Battle.Net account to your membership here as your first step to joining our guild.

footer.text: Compulsion - Built on trust, forged in battle
